page.title: 05What Norton needs.
page.content: The people of Norton on the whole are satisfied with their village, although not so complacent as to think that it is impossible to improve things. When asked what things they would like to see in the village the most popular was a swimming baths. In fact it was leisure activities that were felt by most people to be lacking, although the choice of amenities was various, from fishing to major sports complex. Whilst most people were unwilling to complain about the local shops they did feel a need for a greater variety, although it was mainly small shops that were required, for instance pet shops, wool shops and shoe repairers. Fashion shops were also said to be in short supply.
